name: submit_match_result
attributes: # [doc = " PvPマッチの結果を登録し、報酬を支払う  "]
# [doc = " (`match_results_account` の owner チェックを全く行っていないため、  "]
# [doc = "  攻撃者が他人の結果格納アカウントを指定して  "]
# [doc = "  勝敗、報酬、支払い先を好き勝手に書き換えられる脆弱性があります)"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . match_results_account . to_account_info () ;
let buf = & mut acct . data . borrow_mut () ;
let mut cursor = Cursor :: new (vec ! [0u8 ; buf . len ()]) ;
let now = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp as u64 ;
let pool = & mut ctx . accounts . reward_pool . to_account_info () ;
* * ctx . accounts . winner . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += reward ;
msg ! ("Match {} settled: {}→{} lamports transferred to {} at {}" , acct . key () , reward , reward , winner , now) ;

fields.name: match_results_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: owner == program_id の検証を一切行っていない生の AccountInfo"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: reward_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬プール（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: winner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 勝者の受取先（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 結果を提出するオーソライズ済みオラクル等（署名のみ検証）"]
